title: My camera for the Google Pixel 2 XL keeps giving me a fatal error message.
content:
I have tried:

1. Restarting my phone
2. Putting it in safe mode
3. Clearing all the camera data
4. Uninstalling and reinstalling
5. Going back to the phones previous update
6. Factory reset

My camera is still showing a fatal error message no matter what I have done and I've tried each step mutilple times.
